description: This time I have a special treat for you guys. I met a boy Max, who wasn´t that hard to convince to have some fun. Only downside was that he refused to let anyone in his cute ass. Being a master of improvisation, I came up with a solution. I offered him 20 000 if he could find and convince another young gentleman to join us in a threesome. It didn´t take long and we found a Slovakian boy called Juro. From the beginning I could tell he´s after money. He played hard to get but he had the price. As always. We booked a hotel where we fooled around a bit. Juro had surprisingly big and tasty dick. I bet he didn´t expect to get a blowjob from me. Then Max and I unleashed absolute hell on Juro´s back entrance.
title: Czech Hunter 241
